alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis; Northern Cook, Northern Lake (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 18 at 12:45AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern St. Louis and southwestern Lake Counties through 115 AM CDT... At 1245 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Whiteface Reservoir, to 8 miles east of Cotton, to Canyon, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Whiteface Reservoir around 1255 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Fairbanks, Wolf Lake and Boulder Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis; Northern Cook, Northern Lake
